Side Effects: I'm weak and nauseas. I'm moody but I have irregular cycles so I'm always moody. I've been on it for 3 weeks and have over 2 months to go.
Comments: My heavy bleeding has stopped and now I just spot daily. It's better than daily blood clots like before.

Side Effects: I had no periods for three months after I started Megace and then they were irregular with occasional spotting (My periods were perfectly ordered before). No appetite change or weight gain. Mood changes_ dizziness.
Comments: My fibroids started to grew very fast and my gyno said it is because of progestin intake. He said generally it is thought that only estrogens increase the fibroid growth_ which is inaccurate and progestins can grow them as well.

Side Effects: I have had no side effects from this medication as to date.  Although I must mention I am on the liquid and it tastes absolutely disgusting.  Small price to pay to be healthy again however.  I have found that a potted meat sandwich is the best food to take with this medication.  It quickly removes the disgusting taste from your mouth and you can't go wrong with a few calories in your diet if your tying to gain weight anyhow right?  I have been on this medication for 7 days now and have gained a total of 6.4 pounds.  I was almost 30 lbs under weight so I still have a long road ahead of me but I'm off to a great state.  This is the first medication I have been given that actually helps.  I've tried everything herbal under the sun_ been to dietitians_ counted calories and ate like a pig.  This is my motive drug!

Extreme hunger_ loss of menstrual cycle_ night sweats_ extreme thirst_ left arm mild spontaneous twitching_ very mild left eyelid spasms_ body water retention_ knee aches due to weight gain_ severe headaches for about 1-2 weeks when stopped taking Megace
Comments: Most definitely worth the various mild side effects! Reached goal of gaining 30 pounds and regained appetite! I do think doctors should wean a patient off of this medication even though i dont see too many reviews saying that it's recommended.

Side Effects: Increased appetite. 20lb wt gain_ irritability_ insomnia
Comments: I had heavy bleeding that resulted in me being anemic and fatigued and couldn't concentrate. I started 40mg twice a day and my bleeding stopped within 3 days. If not bled in 3 mths and getting a hysterectomy in a mth. Despite its side effects this drugs benefits outweigh the risks for me

Side Effects: Terrible moodiness and irritably.
Comments: I have Major Depression Disorder. This drug shouldn't be prescribed to psychiatric patients.

Side Effects: Severe tiredness_ insomnia_ confusion_ indigestion_ heartburn
Comments: 6 months of daily bleeding..This medicine stopped the bleeding by day 3. I started this medicine 2 weeks after having a blood transfusion and d & c. So glad to have days of no flow. I have 2 doses left so I'll see what happens when I'm done. Side effects are horrible especially the fatigue. Almost fell asleep driving.

Side Effects: HUNGRY!!! All day long! I can eat even when my belly can't take anymore and thats a Good thing! I've went from 97lbs to 111 in 3 weeks and it feels amazing. The downfalls for me are Night sweats_ constant peeing at night. Constantly thirsty_ heavy breathing in the beginning but that's leveled out. And I woke up with bruises all over my thighs_ contacted my doc who pulled me off meds for two weeks. Still haven't had a period but it Works wonders for me!
Leg pain_ chest pain_ headache _ hot flashes
Insomnia_ missed period. Also_ the first dose I took made me feel drunk and I had short term memory issues for about 3 hours_ but it faded away.
Comments: I gained about 3 pounds (if not more) per week! This was much needed after losing 10 pounds in 2 months from eosinophilic esophagitis closing off my throat and making it so hard to get enough calories in plus reduced appetite from the stress of that. I was only 95 pounds before that happened! This drug_ even with its slightly annoying side effects_ has absolutely saved me from a hospital stay and NG tube. I'm not a big fan of western meds_ but it has made me look/feel healthier and energetic and so quickly. I'm back to the gym and will be weaning off the megace very soon because my body can take it from here.

Side Effects: Night sweats_ interrupted sleep and frequently urinating at night I was 109lbs and looked gaunt and lacked womanly curves. I'm now 120 which is perfect for my 5'4 height my butt looks great only take recommended dosage I was anxious and took 4 tsp a day with my first bottle and the side effects were unbearable now that I take only the 2 tsp the side effects are pretty latent oh yeah it stopped my cycle as well but I have painful 7 day cycles so that was a + for me!

Night sweats_ frequent urination_ extreme hunger_ palpitations_ shortness of breathe_ interrupted menstrual cycle. Gained 20 pounds in a month_ completely satisfied  results despite the side effects.  The outcome overrides the side effects.

Its making my heart beat really fast and I'm dizzy_stomach cramps_tightness n my chest_shortness of breath_terribl headaches_ and also making me bleed(its been 7days already) I've been taking adipex and its interfering with my weightloss... I really hate this drug it has to many side effects.
Sensitivity to light_ restlessness_ slight confusion_ frequent urination and of course why we are all mostly here...Extreme hunger!
Comments: The side effects are worth it! This drug will no doubt save my life I have lost 65lbs in less than a year_ 3 surgeries later.... I now weigh 110 lbs. 6' - 0" tall. I will get back to you in another 90 day's and we'll see where we're at! As for now_  attitude is everything_ Fight_Fight_Fight!!! Good Luck all and may GOD Bless YOU! T.Y.Megace/Doctor's

Side Effects: Took one pill and this has made me hungrier than a lion at a gazelle buffet and so sleepy
30lb weight gain_ nausea_ fatigue_ moodiness_ extreme inability to concentrate

Loss of sex drive_increased appetite which caused weight gain_ increased blood preasure_ cramps in my calves_ bad night sweats and hot flashes.  Mood swings which alter every day living and fatigueness.
Comments: Had Extensive Complex Hyperplasia Atypical and a hysterectomy was not an option for me as I wanted to have a child. Doctors would have preferred to do one but I fought it. I was on aggressive Provera and Prometrium therapy before Megace but needed to get something stronger to reverse the condition before I could try for a child.  Megace altered my life so much I had to work from home once a week b/c things would really get to me and I would be VERY fatigue by mid week.  Gained 30 lbs in 3 months and when I tried to work out the fatigueness increased.  Am going back on Provera @ 40 mg 2x a day which is still aggressive but I am at the end of the conidition and hopefully only need 1 more D&C to test. Next month will be 1 yr since I started aggressive progesterone therapy.  I would have a good discussion with your doctor about this med if this is what is recommended. If I didn't want a child so bad I would have told them to do a hysterectomy b/c this med ruined my quality of life.

Side Effects: Megace works wonderfully.  I have not experienced any side effects besides sweating (only at night) and more frequent urination.  It has brought my appetite back and I have gained 8 pounds in 3 weeks.  Great drug!
Increased urination (especially during the night)_ lowered sex drive.
Comments: I've always had high metabolism and low appetite_ was 6'3"_ 150lb and hated it. In two months_ I gained thirty pounds and have never been happier with my self-image in my life.  This was the miracle drug I had been waiting for for years and while the side effects were annoying at worst_ they were well worth the advantages.

Side Effects: Weight gain and developed diabetes. Hair loss and breast reduction.
Comments: I would not take this if you are already overweight. I think it may result in subsequently developing diabetes and it did not shrink my fibroids.  They grew! It did diminish the bleeding problem associated with the fibroids_ but it wasn't worth getting the new problems that developed.

Side Effects: Vaginal bleeding at week # 5; lasted 3 weeks.  Swelling ankles.  Headaches.
Comments: Having Repeat biopsy in one month - so don't know if it worked!

Side Effects: hair loss_ mood swings_ insomnia_ hungry all the time
Comments: I am still taking the medicine and I have gained almost 20 pounds.   The results are well worth the side effects.

Side Effects: fatigue_ weight gain_ swollen ankles_ shortness of breath
Comments: The side effects are worth any inconvience. Taking drug for one year

Side Effects: weight gain_ which brought on shortness of breath_ hypertension;  fatigue; I believe cognitive effects (not thinking clearly
Comments: I know I have to take this. It brought inoperable_ small amount of post-chemo cancer down to nearly the cellular level and they expect even further improvement in that respect. But the side effects have slowed me up terribly and are rough.

Side Effects: Side-effects change from month to month.  The first noticeable side effects were increased appetite and frequent urination.  I started dieting and have lost about 20 lbs.  Soon started noticing that I had trouble falling asleep and then sleep interruption (had to get up during the night to urinate).  I also get a lot of headaches_ gas_ pain in stomach and back_ loss of sex drive_ mood swings_ loss of concentration_ fatigue_ tiredness and most recently pain in calf. There is some bleeding_ but not like having a period.  Haven't had a period since I've been on the medication.
Comments: This medication works.  I realized I had a problem when I started having really heavy and continuous periods.  I had lots of clots and was always weak_ felt faint and nauseous.

Side Effects: Loss of menstrual cycle_ dry mouth
Comments: It increased my weight almost immediately and I gained weight_ but my menstruation cycle was disrupted

Side Effects: 40mg once per day and only noticable side effect is some minor heartburn.
Comments: I was experiencing a lot of pelvic pain (due to adenomyosis) and very heavy menstral bleeding (due to uterine fibroids).  Within 3 days of starting this regimen_ it stopped the bleeding_ cold.  No bleeding_ no spotting_ nothing!  I'm probably still looking at a hysterectomy due to the adenomyosis_ but I hope to stay on this med until then.

Side Effects: Gynecologist prescribed it for heavy periods due to fibroids.  Stopped the bleeding cold_ but four days later I got a blood clot that led to a pulmonary embolism and almost killed me.
Comments: If you have any blood clotting disorders (I have Factor V Leiden) do not take this drug under any circumstances.  I also think any doctor who prescribes it should do a comprehensive blood test for clotting disorders first.  In my case_ my gyno knew about my clotting disorder and prescribed it anyway.  The blood clot risk is in the literature but I found it before he did.

Side Effects: Increased appetite and increase need for liquid fluids.
Comments: I was diagnosed in February 2007 with stage 4 stomach cancer.  After 6 months of chemo all malignant cells were destroyed_ however the main tumor mass with malignant cells remain.  I have completed 5 weeks of radiation on the tumor which destroyed my appetite.  Megace has increased my appetite and a need for fluids which is very important.  I have only taken megace for two weeks_ hopefully I will gain the 45 lbs back that I loss during treatment.  I will get back to you in a couple of months.

Side Effects: chronic fatigue_ no sex drive_ irritable_ periods of increased hunger.  The chronic fatigue is horrible. I don't drive by myself anymore_ afraid I will fall asleep at the wheel.
Comments: Standard choice of treatment for my cancer_ I will be discussing the side effects with my doctor next month.

Side Effects: The side effects i went through while on megace was that i had frequent urination_ no sex drive at all_ night sweats_ blurred vision sometimes_ mood changes_ hungry all the time
Comments: i was really underweight i gained 20 pounds it helped me a lot.. yeah the side effects where bad but i got used to it and i loved the results it was worth taking Megace.. the side effects go away right after u stop talking it..

Reason: For weight gain for Celiac Disease
Side Effects: Really bad fatugue_ tingling sensation in neck and mouth_ ankle and leg water retention. Gained 14 pounds in 3 weeks which was amazing but_ side effects which over ride the outcome. Feeling like I am crashing all the time and metal taste in mouth_it also caused me to not have a menstal cycle.
Comments: I think the drug is worth taking due to my situation of malabsorbtion and lack of gaining weight. But_ the side effects really take over. There is also no way you can get pregnant on this medication if you are young consider this because it can cause deformities in sexual organs of fetus's this can be really hard to deal with so make sure you are not planning on getting pregnant.

Side Effects: There has been an increase in side effects each month as the 5 months have passed (only 2 more months to go!): moodiness_ calf tension/pain_ ankle swelling/fluid retention_ mild weight gain_ frequent urination (even when bladder is nearly empty) which also results in frequent sleep disruption due to waking every 1-2 hours_ extreme fatigue (beyond what is accounted for by sleep disruption)_ mild hypertension_ increased thirst_ occasional headaches/body aches_ occasional diarhea often combined with mild viral-like symptoms (i.e. hot flushes and exhaustion)_ increased appetite.
Comments: My biopsy at 3 months was clean and I am hopeful for my follow-up biopsy in 2 months.  The side effects are worth it because it is looking like I will be able to avoid both cancer and a hysterectomy.  I am glad my gynecologist recommended this approach even with the side effects (the side effects weren't bad for the first 1-2 months).  With diet_ I have managed only a 5 lb. weight gain over the last 2 months only.  It is my hope to stop this gain and possibly reverse it before my next M.D. appointment.

Side Effects: Extreme insomnia_ hot flashes_ nausea_ indigestion_ back aches_ tension/anxiety_ no sex drive_ heart palpitations_ urinary problems
Comments: Cancer is gone but still have complex hyperplasia - MD says I need hysterectomy and I am starting to believe him. Side effects are wearing me down and quality of life is severely diminished.

Side Effects: I have been on Megace for 5 months now and at my last Dr visit_ 2 months ago_ the repeat biopsy came back beign. I'm still on the Megace.  I've had side effects_tiredness_ moodiness and irritibility and low sex drive_ but the Megace saved me from a hysterctomy.  I visit my Dr again in a month_ so we shall see.  I guess it's been worth it. +
Horrible hot flashes_ irritability_ depression_ insatiable appetite_ weight gain_ moodiness_ insomnia_ fatigue_ heart palpitations.
Comments: Dr. took me off Megace due to finding of pre-cancerous cells vs. actual cancer.  Symptoms have improved immediately.

Side Effects: extreme fatigue_ some periods of increased hunger_ mood change-intolerance_ impatience_ frustrated easily_ poor quality sleep
Comments: Still taking Megace for another month_ so I don't know yet whether it will be effective in eliminating the hyperplasia.

Side Effects: Weight gain (40 lbs)_ extreme fatigue_ hair thinning.
Comments: Megace is the gold standard for my type of cancer_ but the side effects are very difficult to live with.

Side Effects: insomnia_ loss of hair_ edema
Comments: it did increase my appetite_ but the side effects are not worth it.

Side Effects: Back aches_ tension/anxiety_ sleeplessness_ feeling of heaviness_ tired_ low sex drive_ heart palpitations and racing intermittently during the day and evening. Increased appetite.
